item.title: Fox News headed for trial, again, over 2020 election fraud claims
item.description: The defamation case brought by voting technology company Smartmatic against Fox News can proceed, a New York state appellate court rules.

item.title: More than half a million students were out of school because of LA fires this week
item.description: School districts in and around Los Angeles shut down because of the fires. That includes LAUSD, the second largest school district in the country.

item.title: A small seafood restaurant turns into a national donation hub for LA fire victims
item.description: In response to the devastating fires raging in LA, a small restaurant in Surf City USA has become a channel for big help â€” from locals to people acros...

item.title: New photos show the volcanic plains of Mercury after a spacecraft fly-by
item.description: The BepiColombo spacecraft flew less than 200 miles from Mercury's surface and photographed volcanic plains and icy craters.

item.title: Venezuela's Maduro begins new term as US raises arrest bounty
item.description: The US announces an increased $25 million reward for information leading to the arrest of Venezuelas President Maduro on day he's sworn in for a third...
